Aneta Wallet Version 1.0 Finden Sie Hilfe in Sozialmedia: Transaktion Wallets Einstellungen ###,##0.0000 ###,##0.000000 ###,##0.00
Bitte geben Sie Ihr Ausgabenpasswort ein <string name="label_forgot_password"Password vergessen? Passwörter müssen mindestens 8 Zeichen lang sein Passwort Passwort bestätigen Passwörter stimmen nicht überein Fertig Anwenden Kopieren Kopiert! QR Code Betrag Verwendungszweck Teilen Löschen Ja Abbrechen Keine Details Dismiss Entfernen Bestätigen %1s ERG gerade eben vor wenigen Augenblicken vor %1s Minuten vor %1s Stunden vor %1s Tagen Möchten Sie diese App verlassen? Fehler beim Initialisieren der Kamera. Bitte überprüfen Sie Ihre Datenschutzeinstellungen. Bitte beachten Sie, dass durch das Kopieren der Daten in die Zwischenablage des Geräts jede App, die auf diesem Gerät läuft, darauf zugreifen kann, solange Sie die Daten in der Zwischenablage nicht überschreiben. Sie tun dies auf eigenes Risiko. Kopieren und Risiken akzeptieren
Tokens mehr Tokens (unbenannter Token) unbestätigt Empfangen Senden Zeige Währung: %1s synchronisiert %1s 1 ERG ≈ ≈ %1s Mein Wallet Mein Wallet (Lesemodus) Bitte scannen Sie die Signierungsanforderung auf dem Bildschirm der entsprechenden Wallet. Der gescannte QR-Code war nicht von einem bekannten Format.
Wallet hinzufügen Neues Wallet Erzeugt ein Wallet (Schlüssel und eine Adresse) aus einer zufällig generierten Mnemonik. Wallet wiederherstellen Stellt die Schlüssel und die Adresse einer Wallet anhand einer mnemonischen Phrase wieder her. Wallet importieren Verwenden Sie eine exportierte oder gespeicherte Wallet-Datei, um eine bestehende Wallet (Schlüssel und Adressen) zu importieren. Lesemodus wallet Fügen Sie eine Walletaddresse im Nur-Lese-Modus hinzu. Dadurch werden keine Geheimnisse auf diesem Gerät gespeichert.
Enter your public wallet address or your extended public key to add the wallet in read-only mode. Wallet address or key Address already added to \'%1s\' Not a valid ERG address or public key
This is your 15-word Ergo wallet mnemonic. Write down all 15 words (with pen and paper) and store them in a safe place. To confirm that your handwritten mnemonic is correct, enter two words of the phrase now: I understand that I am responsible for storing my mnemonic in a safe place. It is the only way to access my wallet if the keys stored on this device are lost or inaccessible. Word %1s Word not correct
Enter your Ergo wallet mnemonic to regenerate the wallet. Problems reading your notes? Check out the word list and compare. Restore wallet Some words are missing from your mnemonic. Add at least %1s more. Mnemonic contains invalid words. Check for typos. Mnemonic validation failed. If you are sure you have entered it correctly, you can tap again to proceed.
Your wallet\'s main public address is: You can add additional addresses later. Choose how the wallet and keys should be saved on this device. Save password-encrypted Enter a password-phrase that you will need to reenter every time you want to send funds. Save device-encrypted Authenticate on your device to save the wallet and send funds.\nCurrent authentication method: %1s Save in keychain Authenticate on your device to send funds. None Password, PIN or pattern Biometric with strong security Biometric, Class 2
Wallet configuration Descriptive wallet name Changes saved Are you sure you want to erase the wallet from this device?\nThis can\'t be undone. You can display your mnemonic (seed phrase, paper key) in case you have lost your backup, or to confirm that your backup is correct. Display mnemonic You can add this wallet as a read-only wallet to other wallet applications with your extended public key. No secrets will be shared. Display public key
Balance All %1d addresses Tap to view transactions in Ergo Explorer — in-app transaction list will be added soon
Addresses Show content for Main address Derived address %1s %1s tokens A wallet can have multiple public addresses derived from the main address. Add address Add %1d addresses Set a descriptive label (visible only to you) for this address: Descriptive label (optional) You can remove this address from this app\'s view. It is still available on the Ergo Network, can receive payments and hold a balance. You can add it again at any time. Choose an address
Please choose the wallet to send from: to This is a read only wallet. For sending funds, you need a device to sign your transaction. Learn more. Enter the receiver address and amount to send, or scan a QR code. From: %1s Balance: %1s ERG Receiver address Scan QR code Fee: %1s ERG Please enter a valid ERG address Please enter a valid amount Could not send transaction Could not prepare transaction Please enter a valid password Wrong password Transaction was sent successfully and awaits confirmation. Transaction ID: Your transaction was prepared. Scan this QR code with your signing device to proceed.\n\nWhen present, scan the signed transaction QR code to sent it to the network. Your transaction was prepared. Scan these QR codes with your signing device to proceed. Scan signed tx Next Authentication required Security error: %1s Token Send all Choose token to send Please enter valid token amounts or remove the invalid token entries You don’t have enough assets in your wallet for that transaction. Please try a different amount. There is not enough balance to send the specified amount: only %1s ERG available. Could not add token \'%1s\' Could not set requested amount for token \'%1s\' Tokens requested, but no ERG amount. A default amount will be sent.
Sign Please check the details of the transaction to issue. Amounts to spent These amounts will be spent when the transaction is processed. Outgoing amounts %1s of %2s These amounts will be sent when the transaction is processed. Your transaction was signed and needs to be sent to the network. Scan this QR code to proceed. Your transaction was signed and needs to be sent to the network. Scan these QR codes to proceed.
Ergo Pay Request Sign with: %1s (%2s) Requesting data from dApp… Message from dApp:\n%1s An error occurred:\n%1s Signing Request received for address %1s, which does not belong to this wallet. Please choose an address to process the Ergo Pay Request. The transaction could not be signed with this wallet\'s keys.
Minting transaction Token description None Full supply amount Could not fetch requested information Content link Content Hash Validate Ergo Wallet can show a preview of content linked to NFT tokens. Please be aware that this content is created by third parties and might be unwanted. Activate Deactivate
